item.title: Mark Knoller, Longtime CBS News White House Correspondent, Dies at 73
item.description: Mark Knoller, the longtime CBS News radio correspondent and veteran political journalist, has died in Washington, D.C. He was 73. CBS News confirmed his death on Saturday, noting he had been in ill he
